title: Update Local References: Symlinks and Paths
description: Update all local symlinks and path references to use claude-golem instead of ralphtools.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Update symlinks in ~/.claude/commands/ to point to new path
Update any CLAUDE.md files referencing old path
Update ralph.zsh if it has hardcoded paths

notes: Created scripts/rename-to-claude-golem.sh migration script. User must run: 1) mv ~/Desktop/Gits/ralphtools ~/Desktop/Gits/claude-golem 2) cd ~/Desktop/Gits/claude-golem && bash scripts/rename-to-claude-golem.sh 3) Update ~/.zshrc manually. ralph.zsh has no hardcoded repo paths (only config dir paths which stay as ralphtools). Updated ~/.claude/CLAUDE.md reference.
